scripts.postinstall: pnpm install-frontend && pnpm install-backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ combined pnpm install complete'
scripts.install-frontend: cd frontend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm install in frontend/' && pnpm install
scripts.install-backend: cd backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm install in backend/' && pnpm install
scripts.update: pnpm update-frontend && pnpm update-backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ combined pnpm update complete'
scripts.update-frontend: cd frontend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm update in frontend/' && pnpm update
scripts.update-backend: cd backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm update in backend/' && pnpm update
scripts.build: pnpm build-frontend && pnpm build-backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ combined pnpm build complete'
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm build in frontend/' && pnpm build
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && echo '\nğŸ’¡ running pnpm build in backend/' && pnpm build
